recipes.label: Exploring Marseille
recipes.startdescription: <Under the Relentless Riviera Sun, we walk streets hazed by the fermented smells of the Mediterranean, The afternoon sometimes brings the relief of a thunderstorm down from the mountains, to wash away the sins of the day.>

recipes.label: Exploring Marseille With An Open Soul
recipes.startdescription: <Under the Relentless Riviera Sun, we walk streets hazed by the fermented smells of the Mediterranean, The afternoon sometimes brings the relief of a thunderstorm down from the mountains, to wash away the sins of the day.>

recipes.label: Found Tune in Marseille
recipes.description: <Under the Relentless Riviera Sun, we walk streets hazed by the fermented smells of the Mediterranean, The afternoon sometimes brings the relief of a thunderstorm down from the mountains, to wash away the sins of the day.>

recipes.label: Met a Member of the Network in Marseille
recipes.description: The city is rife with tale-tellers. Nannies rambling about tales for a coin, sailors with their belly full of stories and liquid, old beggars and young peddlers. As I explore, one of them locks eyes with me. They stare at me with glintful eyes and let a package stick out of their pocket.

recipes.label: Exploring Bizerta
recipes.startdescription: <From the Old Harbor, the many-coloured houses and the cool breeze of the water gives way white buildings and loud bazaars. If I apply my charm, I may find extrordinary peoples, places, or opportunities.>

recipes.label: Exploring Bizerta With An Open Soul
recipes.startdescription: <From the Old Harbor, the many-coloured houses and the cool breeze of the water gives way white buildings and loud bazaars. If I stay open and receptive, I may find discover the peculiar sounds of the city, or be approached by a Raconteur.>

recipes.label: Exploring Constantinople
recipes.startdescription: <The first choice in exploring Constantinople... Which continent do you wish to discover? The city is a crossroads and a bridge. And after that first choice, many more. If I apply my charm, I may find extrordinary peoples, places, or opportunities.>

recipes.label: Exploring Constantinople With An Open Soul
recipes.startdescription: <The first choice in exploring Constantinople... Which continent do you wish to discover? The city is a crossroads and a bridge. And after that first choice, many more. recipes.label: Exploring Ha誰fa
recipes.startdescription: <From the harbor of Haifa, every way to travel is a climb. But after a day of exploring, you can around to the sunset sea, and see all encounters the city gave you laid down below you.>
